Mediterranean Grilled Salmon

This Mediterranean-inspired salmon dish combines fresh fish with classic herbs and citrus. The 6-ounce salmon fillet is enhanced with olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic, and oregano for an authentic Mediterranean flavor. Total time from start to finish is just 22 minutes - 10 minutes for preparation and 12 minutes of cooking time.

Ingredients:
- 6 ounces salmon fillet
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 2 cloves garlic
- 1 teaspoon oregano

Instructions:
1. Marinate salmon in olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs
2. Preheat grill to medium-high heat
3. Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side
4. Rest for 5 minutes before serving

Nutritional Information:
Calories: 320
Protein: 34.5g
Carbohydrates: 2.1g
Fat: 21.3g

Kimchi Tacos

These Korean-Mexican fusion Kimchi Tacos bring together the bold flavors of Korean cuisine with the beloved format of Mexican street food. The combination of spicy kimchi and savory bulgogi beef creates an unforgettable taste experience.

Ingredients:
- 8 corn tortillas
- 2 cups kimchi
- 1 pound bulgogi beef
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil

Instructions:
1. Marinate beef in bulgogi sauce
2. Grill beef until caramelized
3. Warm tortillas
4. Assemble tacos with beef and kimchi
5. Drizzle with sesame oil

These tacos are perfect for a unique weeknight dinner or your next fusion-inspired gathering.

Chocolate Avocado Mousse

This rich, creamy dessert is a healthy twist on traditional chocolate mousse that's naturally vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free. The smooth, decadent texture comes from perfectly ripe avocados, while cocoa powder provides deep chocolate flavor and maple syrup adds natural sweetness.

Ingredients:
- 2 large avocados
- 1/2 cup cocoa powder
- 1/4 cup maple syrup

Nutritional Information (per serving):
Calories: 180
Protein: 3.2g
Carbohydrates: 19.5g
Fat: 12.3g

Quick Tuna Wrap

A simple wrap that takes only 5 minutes to prepare. You'll need 5 ounces of tuna, 2 tablespoons of mayonnaise, and 1 large tortilla. This basic combination makes for a quick and convenient meal that can be enjoyed any time of day.

Classic Sourdough Bread

Time: 5 hours preparation + 45 minutes baking

Ingredients:
- 500 grams bread flour
- 100 grams sourdough starter
- 10 grams salt
- 350 milliliters water

Instructions:
1. Mix ingredients and autolyse for 30 minutes
2. Perform 4 sets of stretch and folds
3. Bulk ferment for 4-6 hours
4. Shape and cold proof overnight
5. Bake in Dutch oven at 450°F

This recipe creates a classic artisan-style sourdough loaf. While most of the preparation time is hands-off fermentation, plan ahead as the process spans two days with the overnight proofing. Using a Dutch oven helps create the perfect crust and crumb structure.

Matcha Latte

This vegan and dairy-free matcha latte is a wonderful beverage option for any time of day. 

Ingredients:
- 1.5 teaspoons matcha powder
- 8 ounces oat milk

This drink combines the distinctive character of matcha green tea with the smooth texture of oat milk. Perfect for those following a plant-based diet.

Classic Italian Bruschetta

This traditional Italian dish showcases the simple, fresh flavors of the Mediterranean. 

Ingredients:
- 4 medium tomatoes
- 1/4 cup basil
- 2 cloves garlic

This combination of ripe tomatoes, aromatic basil, and flavorful garlic creates a classic Italian favorite that captures the essence of Mediterranean cuisine.

One-Pot Chicken Rice

This simple and comforting dish comes together in under an hour, perfect for busy weeknight dinners. The chicken thighs become tender and flavorful as they cook together with the rice in the same pot. This recipe is naturally gluten-free.

Total Time: 55 minutes
Prep Time: 10 minutes
Cook Time: 45 minutes

Ingredients:
• 1.5 pounds chicken thighs
• 2 cups rice
• 4 cups chicken broth

This family-friendly meal creates minimal dishes to wash and fills your kitchen with wonderful aromas as it cooks. Garnish with fresh herbs if desired, and serve hot.

Mexican Street Corn (Elote)

This beloved street food classic brings the vibrant flavors of Mexican cuisine right to your home. Whether you're hosting a backyard gathering or craving an authentic taste of Mexico, this simple yet delicious dish will transport you to the bustling streets of Mexico City.

Ingredients:
- 4 ears of corn
- 1/4 cup mayonnaise
- 1/2 cup cotija cheese

This traditional Mexican dish is perfect for summer entertaining and can be served as either an appetizer or side dish. The sweet corn pairs beautifully with the creamy mayo and salty cotija cheese for an unforgettable combination that's sure to have everyone asking for seconds.

Classic Wedding Cake

This elegant multi-tiered cake requires 2 hours of preparation time and 35 minutes of baking time.

Ingredients:
- 6 cups cake flour
- 2 pounds butter
- 12 large eggs
- 2 tablespoons vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Cream butter and sugar until fluffy
2. Add eggs one at a time
3. Alternate adding flour and milk
4. Divide between prepared pans
5. Bake at 350°F
6. Cool completely before frosting
7. Stack and decorate layers

This traditional recipe creates a beautiful wedding cake perfect for your special day. Make sure all ingredients are at room temperature before beginning. Grease and line your cake pans before starting the preparation process.
